skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Cosmos Home skill allow users to manage in a simple way smart lighting and ventilation equipment. Turn ON and OFF fans and other devices in a simple way.

Smart ventilation supported devices:

Improved WhisperGreenSelect™ Fans
- WhisperGreenSelect FV-0511VK2 (50-80-110 CFM)
- WhisperGreenSelect FV-1115VK2 (110-130-150 CFM)

Supply In-Line Fan
- WhisperFreshSelect™ FV-15NLFS1

Range Hood
- WhisperHood IA FV-36RBQL1
- WhisperHood IAQ FV-36RLQL1
- WhisperHood IAQ FV-36RCQL1
- WhisperHood IAQ FV-30RCQL1
- WhisperHood IAQ FV-28RNQL1

Smart lighting supported devices:

Any ZigBee HA 1.2 Certificated device with ON/OFF Cluster support and compatible with Cosmos system, such us:
- Smart Outlets
- Smart light bulbs
- Smart In-Wall Switches

How to link Alexa skill with Cosmos system?

1. First you have to own a valid Cosmos account already associated to an existing Cosmos system.
A Cosmos system is compound by a Cosmos HQ Hub and at least one of the Cosmos supported devices mentioned above.

2. Cosmos Skill for Alexa requires the email and the password from your Cosmos account in order to link the Skill to the Cosmos system.

3. Reach the page of our SmartHome skill and press the "ENABLE" button to perform a link account. This will redirect you to our SSO platform.

4. Insert the Cosmos account credentials (email and password) into the SSO platform and continue.

5. Give a click in the "Allow" button permission to let Cosmos system to link the Skill.

6. If the credentials are valid, the SSO platform will prompt a success message. After that you can close that tab from your browser.

7. After that, go back to Alexa console and press the button "Discover Devices" so the skill can discover all the operative devices already paired and configured to your Cosmos system. If a compatible device has been found by the skill, it will be displayed on the devices' list with the same name as is showing up into the Cosmos system.

Operate the devices using voice commands:

Once the Alexa skill has found at least one device, now you can proceed to control it by saying to your Alexa device a voice command compounded by the following:

Alexa + Action + Device name.

Example:

"Alexa, turn on Exhaust Fan"

"Alexa, turn off Exhaust Fan"

"Alexa, turn on Supply Fan"

"Alexa, turn off Supply Fan"

Supported commands: 
- Turn ON
- Turn OFF

Enjoy your Cosmos system!
